formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'ODBC_SQL' =-
[Syntax] ODBC_SQL(<arg1>[...[,<argN>]])
[Synopsis] Runs the referenced query with the specified arguments
[Description] Runs the following query, as defined in func_odbc.conf, performing substitution of the arguments into the query as specified by ${ARG1}, ${ARG2}, ... ${ARGn}. This function may only be read, not set.
SQL: ${ARG1}
